title: ‘We are monkeys in a zoo’: Remco Evenepoel and teammates fume at near-darkness in Vuelta a España team time trial
content:
Evenepoel and Co. were unhappy at the finish line after racing in near-dark conditions to open the Vuelta a España: 'It is just shame that they let us race in the dark like this.'

Read the full article at ‘We are monkeys in a zoo’: Remco Evenepoel and teammates fume at near-darkness in Vuelta a España team time trial on Velo.
author: ahood
